ThtmlFontStyle Enumeration

Summary

Represents type ThtmlFontStyle.

Namespace: flcHTMLDocElements
Syntax
Delphi
type
 ThtmlFontStyle = (hfsTeleType, hfsItalic, hfsBold, hfsUnderline, hfsStrikeThrough,
 hfsBig, hfsSmall);

The ThtmlFontStyle type exposes the following members.
